rules_text:
When Searoalite Refractor enters the battlefield, return up to one artifact you control to its owner's hand. If you do, exile target artifact, creature, or enchantment an opponent controls.
Retreat 4 {5}{U}{U} [i](Exile this permanent face-down. Distribute up to four +1/+1 counters among up to four target creatures you control.)[/i]
